textAfterTable: The intervention programs included on the chart are some of the many supplemental  intervention programs that can be used for Tier II. The WVDE does not endorse nor imply endorsement of the intervention programs.  This list is to be used solely as a resource for districts/schools/teachers to become better informed when making decisions regarding selecting supplemental intervention programs.
